post.author: Admin
post.title: Basket Raffle for Alec Miciunas' Family
post.description: We were all saddened to hear of the loss of one of our Band Family, Alec Miciunas. Friends of the Mi
post.content:
We were all saddened to hear of the loss of one of our Band Family, Alec Miciunas. Friends of the Miciunas family are holding a basket raffle to help with the cost of medical bills. Attached is a form with all the details. Thank you all for your support of Alec's family in their time of sorrow.

NRMB_Alec_Flyer.pdf (81.9KB)
